txt.en:
'My friend, I do not think I can make this journey alone. I know the horrors at the ruined grove are evil spirits, and my mind is ruled by my heart. I will need someone rooted to be my guide.

'Will you help me again? Accompany me to the grove and see me through to meeting Ashâmi?'

<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: Successfully completing the instance in this quest line will place your character in the Elf Oasis of Shoníth after successful completion.</rgb>
Ashâmi led you and Raphûz out of the withered grove to the south-east where you arrived at Shoníth, a hidden oasis and home to the Kintai Elves. Raphûz looks like he wants to speak to you.
Raphûz is resolved to speaking with Ashâmi. He wants to apologize for his affront and is leaving the Tale-wardens behind. He asks for your help to find and reach Ashâmi.

'The Aladi are real. They are not just a superstition of the people. I know she is not ensorcelled. I know she is headstrong and independent. I did not know her intent all along to leave her father behind.

'Such a fierce woman. She burns with a fiery passion. I will learn much from her.

'My friend, I owe you so much for supporting me. Please, will you speak with Ashâmi?'
'I am prepared, my friend. Let us go.'
Complete Instance: Voice on the Wind
Raphûz asked for your assistance in finding, assisting, and apologizing to Ashâmi. He will lead you to the withered grove to the south from his home in Jirush.
